
```{r GetRStatix}
library(rstatix)
```

```{r DataName.hsd}
DataName.hsd = DataName %>% tukey_hsd(ResponseName ~ FactorName)
DataName.hsd %>% kable(caption="Tukey's Honestly Significant Difference multiple comparison test for ResponseName grouped by FactorName.")
```

```{r plotDataName.hsd}
plot(DataName.hsd)
```
